name: Old Time Classic Westerns Quiz | Movie Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: He was Henry Fonda's sidekick in 'Ox-Bow Incident'
questions.explanation:
Harry Morgan.

	It was a very young Col. Potter.

questions.text: Who sang the theme song in 'High Noon'?
questions.explanation:
Tex Ritter.

	Good song; good job.

questions.text: Who was a member of the 'Magnificent Seven'?
This actor turned down the lead in 'High Noon' because he thought it too closely resembled a role that he had recently played.
questions.explanation:
Gregory Peck.

	Peck had starred in 'The Gunfighter'.

questions.text: She played Van Heflin's wife in 'Shane'.
questions.explanation:
Jean Arthur.

	I believe it was her last role.

Kirk Douglas and Victor Mature.

	Douglas in 'Gunfight at OK Corral' (Lancaster as Wyatt Earp) and Mature in 'My Darling Clementine' (Fonda as Wyatt Earp)

questions.text: This actress was in both 'Mark of Zorro' and 'Darling Clementine'.
questions.explanation:
Linda Darnell.

	Yes, I know that it's a small stretch to call 'Zorro' a western.

questions.text: He played the title role in 'The Virginian'.
She was John Wayne's romantic interest in 'Stagecoach'.
questions.explanation:
Claire Trevor.

	A good role for her.

questions.text: This actor played a supporting role in 'Hombre'.
questions.explanation:
Martin Balsam.

	It was the always-reliable Balsam.
